scripts.build:local: echo '🔨 Building Docker image posey-agents:latest...' && docker build -t posey-agents:latest . && docker images posey-agents:latest
scripts.k8s:check: kubectl cluster-info > /dev/null 2>&1 || (echo 'Error: Kubernetes cluster not accessible. Please ensure:'; echo '1. Kubernetes is running (minikube, kind, etc.)'; echo '2. kubectl is configured correctly'; echo '3. Your VPN is connected if using a remote cluster'; exit 1)
scripts.deploy:local: yarn build:local && yarn k8s:check && kubectl apply -f ./k8s/agents-pvc.yaml -n posey && kubectl apply -f ./k8s/service.yaml -n posey && kubectl apply -f ./k8s/deployment-local.yaml -n posey
scripts.verify: kubectl get pods -n posey -l app=posey-agents && kubectl get services -n posey -l app=posey-agents
scripts.debug: echo '🔍 Checking Docker images:' && docker images | grep agents && echo '🔍 Checking Kubernetes pods:' && kubectl get pods -n posey -l app=posey-agents -o wide && echo '🔍 Checking pod details:' && kubectl describe pod -n posey -l app=posey-agents || echo 'No pods found' && echo '🔍 Checking PVC status:' && kubectl get pvc -n posey | grep agents && echo '🔍 Checking Kubernetes events:' && kubectl get events -n posey --sort-by=.metadata.creationTimestamp | tail -n 15
scripts.connect: echo 'Agents service is available at: http://localhost:5555 (when port-forwarded)' && echo 'To port-forward: kubectl port-forward service/posey-agents 5555:5555 -n posey'
